title: Looking For Content Creator
body:
Paragon eSports is looking for someone interested in all aspects of the eSports scene as well as someone who takes an interest in writing.

Paragon eSports is a Multi-Genre Organisation based in Oceania and we are  looking for a Content Creator for Social Media and Our website, this will consist of you writing articles about our various teams in LoL, CS:GO and Smite, whether is introducing a new player or writing about a tournament that  one of the teams have placed well in.

We can talk about it position more in depth when you add me.

Please Message me on League or Add me on Skype (ivTruth).
@Paragon_eSp - @PGN_Miracle
